entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:17 PM CST Tuesday 25 April 2023
